uvi.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.14.10
uvi.description:
sctp: break out if skb_header_pointer returns NULL in sctp_rcv_ootb

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 8180611c238e11676612eb2a9828b1c7a3a4d77b, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 3acb50c18d8d6650f10919464ade4dcdaf41d62f. For more details please see the references link.
